item.title: Aegis Blade
item.fluff: This blade allows you to place your aegis on all nearby foes with a single word of power

headline.name: Critical
headline.text: +1d6 damage per plus, or +1d8 damage per plus against an enemy marked by your arcane aegis

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: Effect: Close burst 3 (each enemy in burst); Each target is marked by you (save ends).
Arcane Aegis: Targets count as being marked by your arcane aegis class power.

item.title: Aftershock Weapon
item.fluff: This weapon sends ripples of force toward nearby foes on a telling blow

headline.name: Critical
headline.text: +1d6 damage per plus, and each enemy adjacent to the target of the critical hit is knocked prone

item.title: Alfsair Spear
item.fluff: This spear is a favorite weapon among druidic traditions

block.name: Property
block.line: If you are proficient with totem implements, you can choose to treat this spear as a totem implement.

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: Trigger: You score a critical hit against an enemy with this spear
Effect: The triggering enemy is dazed until the start of your next turn.

item.title: Anathema Weapon
item.fluff: This weapon shines in the presence of aberrant menace, dealing greater damage to such enemies

headline.name: Critical
headline.text: +1d6 damage per plus, or +1d8 damage per plus against aberrant creatures

block.name: Property
block.line: When an aberrant creature is within 5 squares of this weapon while it is being wielded, it sheds dim light in a 1-square radius.
You can suppress this the weapon from shedding light as a free action until the end of your next turn. If you do, you receive a mental warning when an aberrant creature is within 5 squares.

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: Effect: Before the end of the encounter, the first Weapon attack with this weapon that hits an aberrant creature deals +1[W] extra damage to that creature.
Augment 2: +2[W] extra damage.

item.title: Anointed Mace
item.fluff: This steel mace is scribed with several runes of divine power, one side of its crushing end is marked with a rune of life, the other with a rune of final endings for the restless dead

block.name: Property
block.line: You gain a +1 item bonus to attack rolls against undead creatures with this weapon.

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: Trigger: You reduce an enemy to 0 or fewer hit points with this weapon
Effect: Close burst 5 (you or one ally in burst; target must be bloodied); The target regains hit points equal to twice this weapon's enhancement bonus.

item.title: Armblade
item.fluff: This serrated sword blade fits snugly over one of your arms

headline.name: Attached Component
headline.text: You must have the Living Construct racial trait to use this item.

block.name: Property
block.line: The weapon gains the Free Hand weapon property.
If the weapon has the Off-hand or Light Thrown properties, it is fully retractable. While retracted, Perception checks to find it take a -5 penalty.

item.title: Armbow
item.fluff: This magic crossbow generates its own bolts

headline.name: Attached Component
headline.text: You must have the Living Construct racial trait to use this item.

block.name: Property
block.line: This crossbow becomes a one-handed weapon.
This crossbow does not require ammunition, though you can choose to load it with magical ammunition if you wish.

item.title: Aura-Killer Weapon
item.fluff: The dark purple magic trailing in this weapon's wake shuts down your enemy's instinctive power

headline.name: Critical
headline.text: +1d6 damage per plus, or +1d10 damage per plus against a creature with an active aura

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: Trigger: You hit an enemy that has an aura with an attack using this weapon
Effect: The triggering enemy's aura ends, and the enemy cannont reactivate it (save ends).

item.title: Axe of Sundering
item.fluff: This heavy axe looks battered and old, but the slightest touch shows that its cutting edge is sharp and true

headline.name: Critical
headline.text: +1d6 damage per plus, or +1d10 damage per plus against objects and animates

headline.name: Item Bonus
headline.text: Damage rolls against objects and animates

block.name: Property
block.line: Your Weapon damage rolls, including critical damage, with this weapon deal maximum damage against objects.

item.title: Bard's Songblade
item.fluff: This simple blade whistles as you whip it through the air, creating melodic tones with every swipe

block.name: Property
block.line: If you are a Bard who has proficiency with this weapon, you also have proficiency in this weapon as an implement.

item.title: Bard's Songbow
item.fluff: This simple bow produces beautiful sounds when you pluck its strings

block.name: Property
block.line: If you are a Bard who has proficiency with this weapon, you also have proficiency in this weapon as an implement.

item.title: Bloodclaw Weapon
item.fluff: The hilt of this weapon digs into its wielder's hand, drawing blood while inflicting a more grievous wound upon an enemy

headline.name: Critical
headline.text: +1d6 damage per plus, or +1d10 damage per plus if you use this weapon's attack power on the attack

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: Trigger: You hit a creature with a Weapon attack using this weapon
Effect: You take damage equal to the weapon's plus. This damage cannot be reduced or prevented in any way.
The triggering creature takes additional damage from the triggering attack equal to twice the weapon's plus.
Special: You regain the use of this power the first time in an encounter you are bloodied.

item.title: Blood Fury Weapon
item.fluff: Often decorated with bloodstones, these blades or axes are favored by dragonborn barbarians

headline.name: Critical
headline.text: +1d6 damage per plus, or +1d10 damage per plus while you're bloodied

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: Effect: You are considered bloodied for all purposes until the end of your next turn.

item.title: Byeshk Weapon
item.fluff: The violet-hued metal that makes up this weapon is anathema to creatures alien to the natural cosmos

headline.name: Critical
headline.text: +1d6 damage per plus, or +1d10 damage per plus against aberrant creatures

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: Trigger: You hit an enemy with a Weapon attack using this weapon
Effect: The triggering enemy is dazed until the end of your next turn.
If the triggering enemy is an aberrant creature, it also reality-bound until the end of your next turn.
While reality-bound, the enemy is restrained and cannot teleport.

item.title: Carnage Weapon
item.fluff: No amount of time spent cleaning and maintaining this weapon removes the old, ingrained bloodstains that are testament to its power and purpose

block.name: Property
block.line: When you roll the maximum result on at least one of this weapon's damage dice, the target takes extra damage equal to twice this weapon's enhancement bonus.

item.title: Challenge-Seeking Weapon
item.fluff: This weapon is always eager to be introduced to a fresh enemy

headline.name: Critical
headline.text: +1d4 damage per plus, or +1d8 damage per plus against an enemy at maximum hit points

block.name: Property
block.line: You deal 1d6 extra damage with this weapon when you hit enemies that are at maximum hit points.
Level 11 or 16: 2d6 extra damage.
Level 21 or 26: 3d6 extra damage.

item.title: Chaos Storm Dagger
item.fluff: This serrated dagger constantly seems to squirm in your hand, as if it were alive

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: Trigger: You make an arcane ranged at-will attack using this dagger, and your attack roll is an odd number
Effect: After the triggering attack has been resolved, you use the same attack power against a different target. You gain a power bonus to the attack roll equal to this dagger's enhancement bonus.

item.title: Chieftain's Weapon
item.fluff: This long weapon's haft is covered in runes, each linked together to form a chain that runs in a spiral along its length

block.name: Property
block.line: Whenever you grant an ally the ability to make a melee or ranged basic attack, that ally gains a +1 item bonus to the attack roll.

item.title: Cloaked Weapon, Lesser
item.fluff: Seemingly unarmed as your foe approaches, you reach behind your band and suddenly this weapon appears in your hands, tilting the odds in your favour

block.name: Property
block.line: When stowed, a lesser cloaked weapon cannot be detected or taken from its owner.

The weapon's owner must speak a chosen word when stowing the weapon somewhere on his or her person. This word becomes the weapon's command word. As a minor action, the weapon's owner can give the command word and reach for the location where the weapon was last stowed, and it will appear in the owner's hand.
The weapon's owner can use the same command word or choose a different one each time the weapon is stowed.
If the weapon's owner dies while the weapon is stowed, the weapon reappears on the owner's body after a year and a day.

item.title: Cursed Weapon
item.fluff: This weapon feels comfortable in your hands

block.name: Property
block.line: The first time during an encounter that you hit an enemy with an attack using this weapon, you take a -2 penalty to the attack rolls of attacks that do not include the enemy as a target.
This penalty lasts until the end of the encounter or until the enemy drops to 0 hit points or less.

item.title: Deadstone Weapon
item.fluff: This weapon is carved from tainted stone and imbued with defiling magic that drinks the life of your enemies

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: Trigger: You hit an enemy with a melee Weapon attack using this weapon
Effect: This weapon absorbs power from the hit. The weapon gains a charge equal to the number of hit points of damage the triggering attack dealt.

Before the end of the encounter, the first time you would take damage from an arcane defiling, you automatically gain temporary hit points before taking that damage. The number of temporary hit points equals the charge this weapon has.

item.title: Deathsteel Weapon
item.fluff: This weapon was forged from death ore mined from the Gol Mountains in the Shadowfell, allowing the wielder to cut through an enemy's necromantic resistances

block.name: Property
block.line: When you deal damage with a Weapon attack using this weapon, the damage ignores necrotic resistance.

item.title: Defensive Weapon
item.fluff: This weapon glows blue when its wielder takes a defensive posture

headline.name: Critical
headline.text: +1d6 damage per plus, or +1d8 damage per plus if you used your second wind since the start of your previous turn

block.name: Property
block.line: When you take the total defense or second wind action, you gain an item bonus to all your defenses until the start of your next turn. The bonus equals this weapon's plus.

item.title: Distance Weapon
item.fluff: This weapon flashes brightly as it hurtles forth, moving with enough force to carry it much farther than normal

block.name: Property
block.line: Increase the weapon's normal range by 5 squares and the long range by 10 squares.

item.title: Dragonscale Dagger
item.fluff: This dagger isn't literally a dragon scale, but it's shaped like one its magic kicks in when your Dragon Magic snarls into force after you are bloodied

block.name: Property
block.line: When your Sorcerer class feature Scales of the Dragon triggers, you also get a +1 item bonus to attack rolls with melee and close attacks using this dagger until the end of your next turn.

item.title: Duelist's Bow
item.fluff: With this mighty weapon humming as you release arrow after arrow, enemy ranged combatants are forced to focus on you

block.name: Property
block.line: When you hit an enemy with a Weapon attack using this weapon, that enemy takes a -2 penalty to ranged and area attack rolls against creatures other you until the end of your next turn.

item.title: Duelist's Blade
item.fluff: The favorite weapon of a rogue

headline.name: Critical
headline.text: +1d6 damage per plus, or +1d8 damage per plus if you have combat advantage against the target

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: Effect: You have combat advantage against the first creature you attack using this weapon during your current turn.

item.title: Dwarven Thrower
item.fluff: The weighted haft of this mithral weapon is engraved with images of giants being struck down by dwarven throwing hammers

headline.name: Critical
headline.text: +1d6 damage per plus, or +1d10 damage per plus on ranged Weapon attacks against Large or larger creatures

block.name: Property
block.line: This weapon gains the Heavy Thrown property with a range of 5/10.
If you have the Dwarven Weapon Proficiency racial trait, the range is instead 7/15.

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: Trigger: You hit a Large or larger creature with a Weapon attack using this weapon
Effect: The triggering attack deals 2 extra damage against the triggering creature, or 3 extra damage if the triggering attack was ranged.
Level 7: 4 extra damage, or 6 extra damage.
Level 12: 6 extra damage, or 9 extra damage.
Level 17: 8 extra damage, or 12 extra damage.
Level 22: 10 extra damage, or 15 extra damage.
Level 27: 12 extra damage, or 18 extra damage.

item.title: Eager Weapon
item.fluff: Your psionic energy primes this weapon to surge into action when an enemy tries to slip past your guard

headline.name: Critical
headline.text: +1d6 damage per plus, or +1d10 damage per plus on opportunity attacks

block.name: Property
block.line: While you have at least 1 power point, you gain a +2 item bonus to attack rolls with opportunity attacks made with this weapon.

item.title: Earth-Wrought Hammer
item.fluff: This hammer appears to be carved from a single piece of stone, though it's no heavier than a normal weapon, and hits your enemies like a battering ram

headline.name: Critical
headline.text: The target is knocked prone, or +1d6 damage per plus if the target was already prone

item.title: Entrapping Weapon
item.fluff: A projectile fired from this weapon keeps your enemy from wandering off

headline.name: Critical
headline.text: +1d6 damage per plus, or 1 damage per plus and the target is restrained until the end of your next turn.

item.title: Farbond Spellblade
item.fluff: When bonded to you, this spellblade returns to your hand faster and from farther distances

headline.name: Critical
headline.text: +1d6 damage per plus, or +1d8 per plus when used as an implement for an arcane power

block.name: Properties
block.line: If you have the Swordbond feature and use it with this weapon, you gain the following benefits:
► The weapon has the Heavy Thrown weapon property, and a range of 5/10.
► You can call this weapon to your hand from up to a mile away.

item.title: Flail of Winds
item.fluff: This flail's bludgeoning head is scribed with runes of elemental magic that form creases and grooves and, when swung, it whistles like a howling wind

headline.name: Critical
headline.text: +1d6 damage per plus, or +1d8 damage per plus with an attack that pushs, pulls, or slides the target

block.name: Property
block.line: When you push, pull or slide a creature with an attack using this flail, you increase the maximum distance by 1 square.
Level 13 or 18: By 2 squares.
Level 23 or 28: By 3 squares.

item.title: Flesh Seeker
item.fluff: Thinner than most weapons of its type, this weapon slips between armored plates and even magic defenses

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: Trigger: You hit an enemy with a Weapon attack using this weapon
Effect: You gain a +2 item bonus to the first attack roll you make against the triggering enemy before the end of the encounter.

item.title: Forester's Axe
item.fluff: This normal-looking axe cuts a swath through plant life of all sorts

headline.name: Critical
headline.text: +1d8 damage per plus, or +1d10 damage per plus against plant creatures

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: Effect: Close blast 3; You destroy vegetation, changing all difficult terrain made up primarily of flora in the blast to normal terrain.
Level 12 or 17: Close blast 5.
Level 22 or 27: This power can be used as an encounter power. You also change all challenging and blocking terrain made up primarily of flora in the blast to difficult terrain.

item.title: Frightful Cleaver
item.fluff: The blade of this axe is a terror to behold, as are the jagged wounds it causes

item.title: Gambler's Weapon
item.fluff: Favored by scoundrels and rogues, this unpredictable blade is not for the faint of heart

headline.name: Critical
headline.text: +1d6 damage per plus, and you can shift 1 square

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: Trigger: You are about to make an attack roll with this weapon
Effect: Roll 1d6 and subtract 3; the result is a power bonus or a penalty to your attack roll.

item.title: Goblin Totem
item.fluff: This crude weapon is carved from bone, its handle wrapped with leather -holding the totem makes you feel more capable of facing even formidably sized foes

block.name: Property
block.line: Your Weapon attacks with this weapon gain an item bonus to damage rolls against a creature larger than you. The item bonus equals this weapon's plus.

item.title: Guardian's Call
item.fluff: Decorated with the sigils of the wind and the oak, this weapon increases your defenses while you're in your guardian form

headline.name: Critical
headline.text: +1d6 damage per plus, or +1d10 damage per plus while you're in a guardian form

block.name: Property
block.line: When you assume a guardian form, pick one defense other than AC. You gain a +2 bonus to that defense while you are in that guardian form.

item.title: Harmonic Songblade
item.fluff: As well as channeling your bard spells, this blade gives off music that swirls away to encircle and empower one of your allies

block.name: Property
block.line: If you are a Bard who has proficiency with this weapon, you also have proficiency in this weapon as an implement.

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: Effect: Close burst 5 (one ally in the burst); The target ally gains a +2 power bonus to attack rolls and all defenses until the start of your next turn.

item.title: Holy Healer's Weapon
item.fluff: Healers who wield this weapon relish combat and enjoy healing their allies while attacking their enemies

headline.name: Critical
headline.text: +1d6 damage per plus, or +1d8 damage per plus if you have healed an ally this turn or the current attack heals an ally

block.name: Property
block.line: You add this weapon's plus to the number of hit points healed by your healing word class power.

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: Effect: Close burst 5 (one ally in the burst); The target can spend a healing surge to regain a number of hit points equal to your Wisdom modifier + five times this weapon's plus.

item.title: Howling Songbow
item.fluff: The projectiles you let fly with this weapon howl as they lance out at your foes

block.name: Properties
block.line: ► If you are a Bard who has proficiency with this weapon, you also have proficiency in this weapon as an implement.
► When you hit a target with a Weapon attack using this weapon, any creature granting the target cover from your attack takes thunder damage equal to this weapon's plus.

item.title: Hungry Spear
item.fluff: A roaring lion engraved on the head of this spear pins your foe in place while you close for the kill

block.name: Property
block.line: This weapon has the Heavy Thrown property and a range of 10/20.

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: Effect: Make a ranged basic attack with this spear. On a hit, the target is also immobilized (save ends). The spear doesn't return to you until the effect on the target has ended.
Special: You can draw this weapon as part of this action.

item.title: Mage's Weapon
item.fluff: Some spellcasters choose this blade for its ability to convert a spell's power into martial skill

block.name: Property
block.line: If you have proficiency with the dagger, you have proficiency with this weapon.

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: Requirement: You must have an unexpended arcane encounter attack power.

Effect: You expend an arcane encounter attack power, and regain the use of a martial encounter attack power. The martial encounter attack power must be of the same level or lower as the arcane encounter attack you expend.

item.title: Manifester Weapon
item.fluff: By focusing your mind on the psionic energy stored in this weapon, you can extract a measure of its power

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: Effect: You gain 1 power point until the end of your next turn. You can only use this power point to augment a psionic attack power.
Level 22 or 27: 2 point points.

item.title: Magic Weapon
item.fluff: A basic enchanted weapon

item.title: Pact Bow
item.fluff: Crafted from a tree deep within the Feywild, this bow is a conduit for eldritch powers

headline.name: Critical
headline.text: +1d6 damage per plus, or +1d8 damage per plus with ranged warlock attacks

block.name: Property
block.line: If you are an elf who has proficiency with this weapon, you can use this weapon as an implement for warlock powers. You do not count as having implement proficiency with this weapon for other purposes.

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: Trigger: You use a ranged warlock power against a target under your curse
Effect: You use the bow's range for the triggering power instead of its normal range, and add the bow's proficiency bonus to the attack roll.

item.title: Pact Hammer
item.fluff: This dark steel hammer is the prized possession of any dwarven warlock who wishes to wield weapon and magic with equal effectiveness

headline.name: Critical
headline.text: +1d6 damage per plus, or +1d8 damage per plus with melee warlock attacks

block.name: Property
block.line: If you are a dwarf who has proficiency with this weapon, you can use this weapon as an implement for warlock powers. You do not count as having implement proficiency with this weapon for other purposes.

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: Trigger: You use a melee warlock power against a target under your curse

Effect: You can use this weapon's reach instead of the power's normal range, and add the hammer's proficiency bonus to the attack roll. You can choose to treat the attack as a Weapon attack instead of an Implement attack.

item.title: Pact Sword
item.fluff: Eladrin warlocks favor these sinister longswords for their ability to combine weapon and magic and for the power to control an enemy's position

headline.name: Critical
headline.text: +1d6 damage per plus, or +1d8 damage per plus melee warlock attacks

block.name: Property
block.line: If you are an eladrin with proficiency with this weapon, you can use this weapon as an implement for warlock powers. You do not count as having implement proficiency with this weapon for other purposes.

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: Trigger: You hit an enemy under your curse with a warlock attack using this weapon
Effect: You teleport the triggering enemy a number of squares equal to 1 + this weapon's enhancement bonus.

item.title: Parrying Weapon
item.fluff: A wielder of this weapon never truly lowers his or her defense

block.name: Property
block.line: You gain a +2 item bonus to AC when you use the total defense action while wielding this weapon.

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: Trigger: An enemy you can see makes a melee attack against you
Effect: You make a melee basic attack against the triggering enemy, with a power bonus to the attack roll equal to this weapon's enhancement bonus.
If your attack roll result exceeds the triggering attack's attack roll result, the triggering attack misses. The melee basic attack you make has no other effects.

item.title: Pinning Weapon
item.fluff: You use this weapon to root your enemy to the spot

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: Trigger: You hit an enemy with this weapon
Effect: The triggering enemy is immobilized until you are no longer threatening it with this weapon.

item.title: Prime Shot Weapon
item.fluff: This weapon demands a wily and cunning wielder who darts from cover to cover while sniping at enemies

block.name: Property
block.line: Your attacks with this weapon deal +1 damage if no ally is closer to the target than you are.
Level 12 or 17: +2 damage.
Level 22 or 27: +3 damage.

item.title: Psychokinetic Weapon
item.fluff: A single thought sends this weapon leaping from your hand to strike a distant foe

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: Effect: You make a ranged basic attack using this weapon, even if it doesn't have the Light Thrown or Heavy Thrown property. If the weapon doesn't have a range, its range is 5/10 for this attack. The weapon returns to your hand after the attack has been resolved.
Augment 2: The attack deals +1[W] extra damage.

item.title: Rebounding Weapon
item.fluff: You meant to do that - no, really

headline.name: Critical
headline.text: +1d6 damage per plus, or +1d10 damage per plus with an attack granted by this weapon's attack power

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: Trigger: You make a ranged attack with this weapon and miss
Effect: You make a ranged basic attack with this weapon against a different target within 5 squares of the triggering target.

item.title: Relentless Weapon
item.fluff: The weapon thrums in your hands, as if eager to see battle

headline.name: Critical
headline.text: +1d6 damage per plus, and the target is knocked prone

item.title: Reproachful Weapon
item.fluff: A strike from this weapon renders your enemy less able to respond

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: Trigger: You hit an enemy with an attack using this weapon
Effect: The triggering enemy takes a -2 penalty to all attack rolls (save ends). The enemy has a penalty to saves against this effect equal to this weapon's enhancement bonus.

item.title: Resounding Weapon
item.fluff: A thunder peal sounds when this weapon hits, dazing its target

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: Trigger: You hit an enemy with an attack using this weapon
Effect: The triggering enemy is dazed until the end of your next turn.

item.title: Staggering Weapon
item.fluff: When you hit with this weapon, you send your foes lurching headlong whichever way you wish

headline.name: Critical
headline.text: +1d6 damage per plus, and the target is knocked prone

block.name: Property
block.line: When you use a Weapon power that slides the target, you can add this weapon's enhancement bonus to the number of squares the target slides.

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: Trigger: You hit with a Weapon attack using this weapon
Effect: Slide the target a number of squares equal to the weapon's enhancement bonus.

item.title: Totemic Spear
item.fluff: This spear's power extends into the spirit world

block.name: Properties
block.line: ► If you are a Shaman who has proficiency with this weapon, you also have proficiency with this weapon as an implement.
► If you have proficiency with this weapon and use it as an implement, your spirit companion's melee reach increases to 2 for that power.

item.title: Totemic Warclub
item.fluff: Some of the power invested in your spirit companion also flows through this warclub

block.name: Properties
block.line: ► If you are a Shaman who has proficiency with this weapon, you also have proficiency in this weapon as an implement.

► If you have proficiency with this weapon and use it as an implement for a power that has a range of Melee spirit, you can choose to use a square in your own space as the origin square of that power.

item.title: Vanguard Weapon
item.fluff: Favored by soldiers of the frontline, this weapon makes any charge formidable

block.name: Property
block.line: This weapon deals +1d6 damage on a successful charge.
Level 23 or 28: +2d6 damage.

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: Special: You lose these benefits if you do not charge as your next action on your current turn.

Effect: If you hit with your charge attack, all allies within 10 squares of you gain a +1 bonus to attack rolls and gain your Charisma bonus as a bonus to damage rolls. These bonuses last until the start of your next turn.

item.title: Venomous Songblade
item.fluff: Like the words you whisper to your enemies, this weapon is filled with poison that saps their strength

block.name: Property
block.line: If you are a Bard who has proficiency with this weapon, you also have proficiency in this weapon as an implement.

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: Trigger:You hit an enemy with an attack using this weapon
Effect: The triggering enemy is weakened (save ends).

item.title: Vicious Weapon
item.fluff: This weapon is pure lethality

headline.name: Critical
headline.text: +1d8 damage per plus, and you can choose to reroll any or all of your critical damage dice, but you must use the second result of each die

item.title: Vitriolic Cudgel
item.fluff: Black, scaly hide covers the weapon's grip and the steel has a greenish cast

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: Trigger: You hit with a Weapon attack using this weapon
Effect: All creatures adjacent to the target (including you) take acid damage equal to 3 + twice the weapon's enhancement bonus.

item.title: Wailing Songbow
item.fluff: The arrows launched by this weapon scream out a note, even while embedded in your foes

block.name: Properties
block.line: ► If you are a Bard who has proficiency with this weapon, you also have proficiency in this weapon as an implement.
► When you hit a creature with a Weapon attack using this weapon, the target takes a penalty to Stealth checks until the end of your next turn. The penalty equals this weapon's enhancement bonus.

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: Effect: You ignore penalties from concealment and total concealment to your next attack roll made with this weapon if you have already hit the target at least once with this weapon during this encounter.

item.title: Warning Weapon
item.fluff: While you hold this weapon, every nearby enemy is known to you, standing out like a shining beacon no matter its stealth or concealment

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: Effect: Until the end of your next turn, you are automatically aware of each enemy within 5 squares of you, including those that are hidden or invisible. You know the squares these enemies occupy, but this knowledge does not negate the effects of cover or concealment.
Level 14: Each enemy within 10 squares of you.
Level 19: Each enemy within 15 squares of you.
Level 24 or 29: Each enemy within 20 squares of you.
Sustain Minor: The effect persists until the end of your next turn.

item.title: Weapon of Healing
item.fluff: When you bolster your allies, this weapon increases the potency of your healing

block.name: Property
block.line: When you use a Healing power to allow an ally to regain hit points, add an item bonus equal to this weapon's enhancement bonus to the number of hit points regained.

item.title: Weapon of Long Range
item.fluff: Though your allies can barely see your enemies approaching, your attacks with this weapon are already finding their targets

block.name: Properties
block.line: ► This weapon gains an additional range increment with maximum range equal to 10 squares longer than the weapon's long range. If a power or ability has restrictions based on long range, the extreme range counts as long range.
► You take the penalty to attack rolls for attacking with this weapon at long range only when attacking at extreme range.

item.title: Weapon of Shared Wrath
item.fluff: When you're injured, this weapon transfers your wrath to an ally, inspiring him or her to attack a foe

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: Trigger: You become bloodied
Effect: Close burst 5 (one ally in burst); The target can make a basic attack as a free reaction.

item.title: Whistling Songbow
item.fluff: Projectiles launched from this weapon whistle as they streak toward their target

block.name: Property
block.line: If you are a Bard who has proficiency with this weapon, you also have proficiency in this weapon as an implement

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: Trigger: You target an enemy with a Bard power using this weapon
Effect: If the triggering attack hits, each ally within 5 squares of the triggering enemy gains a +2 power bonus to his or her first attack roll against that enemy before the end of your next turn.

If the triggering attack misses, one ally of your choice within 5 squares of the triggering enemy gains a +2 power bonus to his or her first attack roll against that enemy before the end of your next turn.

item.title: Wild Flare Dagger
item.fluff: Sparking with barely contained wild magic, this multi-hued dagger sends unpredictable spikes of energy into your enemies

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: Trigger: Your Chaos Burst class feature triggers on an odd attack roll

Effect: The target of the triggering attack roll takes additional damage instead of the normal effect of your Chaos Burst class feature. The additional damage equals 1 + this dagger's enhancement bonus.

item.title: Wyrmtooth Dagger
item.fluff: Carved from a dragon's tooth, this dagger can strip away a creature's elemental defenses

block.name: Property
block.line: On a critical hit, the target loses its resistances (save ends).

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: Effect: Until the end of the encounter, Sorcerer attack powers you use through this dagger ignore the resistances of any enemy within 5 squares of you.
Level 17, 22 or 27: Within 10 squares of you.
